languages.text: "Что ж, тогда благодарю вас за беседу, {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус", {n}— даже если Эвейн язвит, в голосе это не чувствуется. Наклонив голову, он уходит вперед.{/n}
"In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что ж, тогда благодарю вас за беседу, {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус", {n}— даже если Эвейн язвит, в голосе это не чувствуется. Наклонив голову, он уходит вперед.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he means his reply to be caustic, his voice gives no indication of it. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}
"In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he means his reply to be caustic, his voice gives no indication of it. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}
"In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}
"In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}
"In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}
"In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

languages.text: «En ese caso, le agradezco que me brindara su tiempo, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius». {n}Si pretende que sus palabras tengan un tono cortante, su voz no lo refleja. Se retira con una inclinación de cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, le agradezco que me brindara su tiempo, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius». {n}Si pretende que sus palabras tengan un tono cortante, su voz no lo refleja. Se retira con una inclinación de cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann danke ich Euch für Eure Zeit, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Falls seine Worte beißen sollten, lässt sich das aus seinem Tonfall nicht ableiten. Er verneigt sich und geht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann danke ich Euch für Eure Zeit, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Falls seine Worte beißen sollten, lässt sich das aus seinem Tonfall nicht ableiten. Er verneigt sich und geht.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, merci de m'avoir accordé du temps, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius. »{n}Même si ses mots sont censés être cinglants, son ton ne l'est absolument pas. Il vous salue de la tête, puis s'en va.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, merci de m'avoir accordé du temps, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius. »{n}Même si ses mots sont censés être cinglants, son ton ne l'est absolument pas. Il vous salue de la tête, puis s'en va.{/n}

languages.text: “既然如此，感谢您拨冗接见，冯·瓦兰修斯大人。”{n}他的言辞暗含不满，但语气仍旧毕恭毕敬。随后，他点了点头，离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，感谢您拨冗接见，冯·瓦兰修斯大人。”{n}他的言辞暗含不满，但语气仍旧毕恭毕敬。随后，他点了点头，离开了。{/n}

languages.text: 「そうか、お時間をいただき感謝する、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス」{n}そこに飲み込んだ言葉があったとしても、その気配すら感じさせない。彼は頭を下げて立ち去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そう言うことなら、お時間をいただいてしまったね、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス」{n}飲み込んだ言葉があったにしても、その気配すら感じさせない。彼は頭を下げて立ち去った。{/n}
「そうか、お時間をいただき感謝する、{mf|ロード|レディ}・フォン・ヴァランシウス」{n}そこに飲み込んだ言葉があったとしても、その気配すら感じさせない。彼は頭を下げて立ち去った。{/n}

languages.text: "Öyleyse zaman ayırdığınız için teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius." {n}Sözleriyle acıtmak istiyorsa da sesi bunu belli etmiyor. Başını eğerek oradan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "In that case, I thank you for your time, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius." {n}Even if he intends for his words to bite, his voice offers no indication. With a bow of his head, he departs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse zaman ayırdığınız için teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius." {n}Sözleriyle acıtmak istiyorsa da sesi bunu belli etmiyor. Başını eğerek oradan ayrılıyor.{/n}
